prompt_en: a large wave crashes into a lighthouse

The video begins with a serene yet powerful scene of a lighthouse standing resilient against an oncoming storm. The lighthouse, painted in muted tones with a red lantern room, stands tall on a rocky pier. As the camera slowly pans around the structure, the viewer can see the rough texture of the stone and the weathered details of the building. The sky is overcast, casting a soft, diffused light that enhances the dramatic atmosphere.

As the wave recedes, the lighthouse remains steadfast, unyielding to the fury of nature. The camera then slowly zooms out, revealing more of the turbulent sea and the relentless rhythm of the waves.
